BIO

I am Diksha, a 4th year Engineering student. I am currently trying to learn as much as I can, by exploring different technologies, and working on a number of small and large projects.
Through all the experimentation, I would say my interest lies in Web Development.

What I like

I love sunsets and travelling. I also love exploring more and more - be it things or places.
I am also a huge fan of time-travel movies and good music.
And i absolutely love petting dogs.

What I'm learning

I am currently learning React.
I am also learning to be a better programmer.
Other than that, I am learning to drive a bike.

Hobbies

I've a bunch of hobbies. For starters, reading books, wiriting poetry, playing cricket, and photography.
I love to travel and meet new people along the way.

Achievements

Most recently, i was shortlisted to participate in the 'Code for good Hackathon', hosted by JP Morgan. And it was a very fun experience.
I also completed three milestones in the 'Google Cloud Facilitator Program'.
I also built a charity website from scratch, for my college project.
